   21: -module(trace_local_SUITE).
   22: 
   23: -export([basic_test/0, bit_syntax_test/0, return_test/0,
   24: 	 on_and_off_test/0, stack_grow_test/0,
   25: 	 info_test/0, delete_test/1, exception_test/1]).
   26: 
   27: -export([exported/1, exported_wrap/1, loop/4, apply_slave_async/5,
   28: 	 match/2, clause/2, id/1, undef/1, lists_reverse/2]).
   29: 
   30: 
   31: %%
   32: %% Define for debug output
   33: %%
   34: %%-define(debug,1).
   35:  
   36: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   37: -define(DEFAULT_RECEIVE_TIMEOUT, infinity).
   38: 
   39: -ifdef(debug).
   40: -define(dbgformat(A,B),io:format(A,B)).
   41: -else.
   42: -define(dbgformat(A,B),noop).
   43: -endif.
   44: 
   45: %%% When run in test server %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
   46: 
   47: -export([all/0, suite/0,
   48:          basic/1, bit_syntax/1,
   49:          return/1, on_and_off/1, systematic_on_off/1,
   50:          stack_grow/1,info/1, delete/1,
   51:          exception/1, exception_apply/1,
   52:          exception_function/1, exception_apply_function/1,
   53:          exception_nocatch/1, exception_nocatch_apply/1,
   54:          exception_nocatch_function/1, exception_nocatch_apply_function/1,
   55:          exception_meta/1, exception_meta_apply/1,
   56:          exception_meta_function/1, exception_meta_apply_function/1,
   57:          exception_meta_nocatch/1, exception_meta_nocatch_apply/1,
   58:          exception_meta_nocatch_function/1,
   59:          exception_meta_nocatch_apply_function/1,
   60:          concurrency/1,
   61:          init_per_testcase/2, end_per_testcase/2]).
   62: 
   63: init_per_testcase(_Case, Config) ->
   64:     Config.
   65: 
   66: end_per_testcase(_Case, _Config) ->
   67:     shutdown(),
   68: 
   69:     %% Reloading the module will clear all trace patterns, and
   70:     %% in a debug-compiled emulator run assertions of the counters
   71:     %% for the number of functions with breakpoints.
   72: 
   73:     c:l(?MODULE).
   74: 
   75: suite() ->
   76:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]},
   77:      {timetrap, {minutes, 2}}].
   78: 
   79: all() ->
   80:     [basic, bit_syntax, return, on_and_off, systematic_on_off,
   81:      stack_grow,
   82:      info, delete, exception, exception_apply,
   83:      exception_function, exception_apply_function,
   84:      exception_nocatch, exception_nocatch_apply,
   85:      exception_nocatch_function,
   86:      exception_nocatch_apply_function, exception_meta,
   87:      exception_meta_apply, exception_meta_function,
   88:      exception_meta_apply_function, exception_meta_nocatch,
   89:      exception_meta_nocatch_apply,
   90:      exception_meta_nocatch_function,
   91:      exception_meta_nocatch_apply_function,
   92:      concurrency].
   93: 
   94: %% Tests basic local call-trace
   95: basic(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   96:     basic_test().
   97: 
   98: %% OTP-7399: Make sure that code that uses the optimized bit syntax matching
   99: %% can be traced without crashing the emulator.
  100: bit_syntax(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  101:     bit_syntax_test().
  102: 
  103: %% Tests the different types of return trace
  104: return(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  105:     return_test().
  106: 
  107: %% Tests turning trace parameters on and off,
  108: %% both for trace and trace_pattern
  109: on_and_off(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  110:     on_and_off_test().
  111: 
  112: %% Tests the stack growth during return traces
  113: stack_grow(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  114:     stack_grow_test().
  115: 
  116: %% Tests the trace_info BIF
  117: info(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  118:     info_test().
  119: 
  120: %% Tests putting trace on deleted modules
  121: delete(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  122:     delete_test(Config).
  123: 
  124: %% Tests exception_trace
  125: exception(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  126:     exception_test([]).
  127: 
  128: %% Tests exception_trace
  129: exception_apply(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  130:     exception_test([apply]).
  131: 
  132: %% Tests exception_trace
  133: exception_function(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  134:     exception_test([function]).
  135: 
  136: %% Tests exception_trace
  137: exception_apply_function(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  138:     exception_test([apply,function]).
  139: 
  140: %% Tests exception_trace
  141: exception_nocatch(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  142:     exception_test([nocatch]).
  143: 
  144: %% Tests exception_trace
  145: exception_nocatch_apply(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  146:     exception_test([nocatch,apply]).
  147: 
  148: %% Tests exception_trace
  149: exception_nocatch_function(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  150:     exception_test([nocatch,function]).
  151: 
  152: %% Tests exception_trace
  153: exception_nocatch_apply_function(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  154:     exception_test([nocatch,apply,function]).
  155: 
  156: %% Tests meta exception_trace
  157: exception_meta(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  158:     exception_test([meta]).
  159: 
  160: %% Tests meta exception_trace
  161: exception_meta_apply(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  162:     exception_test([meta,apply]).
  163: 
  164: %% Tests meta exception_trace
  165: exception_meta_function(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  166:     exception_test([meta,function]).
  167: 
  168: %% Tests meta exception_trace
  169: exception_meta_apply_function(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  170:     exception_test([meta,apply,function]).
  171: 
  172: %% Tests meta exception_trace
  173: exception_meta_nocatch(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  174:     exception_test([meta,nocatch]).
  175: 
  176: %% Tests meta exception_trace
  177: exception_meta_nocatch_apply(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  178:     exception_test([meta,nocatch,apply]).
  179: 
  180: %% Tests meta exception_trace
  181: exception_meta_nocatch_function(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  182:     exception_test([meta,nocatch,function]).
  183: 
  184: %% Tests meta exception_trace
  185: exception_meta_nocatch_apply_function(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  186:     exception_test([meta,nocatch,apply,function]).
  187: 
  188: 
  189: %%% Message patterns and expect functions %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  190: 
  191: -define(pCT(P,M,F,A),   {trace,   P,call,{M,F,A}}).
  192: -define(pCTT(P,M,F,A),  {trace_ts,P,call,{M,F,A},{_,_,_}}).
  193: -define(pRF(P,M,F,A,V), {trace,   P,return_from,{M,F,A},V}).
  194: -define(pRFT(P,M,F,A,V),{trace_ts,P,return_from,{M,F,A},V,{_,_,_}}).
  195: -define(pEF(P,M,F,A,V), {trace,   P,exception_from,{M,F,A},V}).
  196: -define(pEFT(P,M,F,A,V),{trace_ts,P,exception_from,{M,F,A},V,{_,_,_}}).
  197: -define(pRT(P,M,F,A),   {trace,   P,return_to,{M,F,A}}).
  198: -define(pRTT(P,M,F,A),  {trace_ts,P,return_to,{M,F,A},{_,_,_}}).
  199: 
  200: -define(CT(M,F,A),    ?pCT(_,M,F,A)    = receive_next()).
  201: -define(CTT(M,F,A),   ?pCTT(_,M,F,A)   = receive_next()).
  202: -define(RF(M,F,A,V),  ?pRF(_,M,F,A,V)  = receive_next()).
  203: -define(RFT(M,F,A,V), ?pRFT(_,M,F,A,V) = receive_next()).
  204: -define(EF(M,F,A,V),  ?pEF(_,M,F,A,V)  = receive_next()).
  205: -define(EFT(M,F,A,V), ?pEFT(_,M,F,A,V) = receive_next()).
  206: -define(RT(M,F,A),    ?pRT(_,M,F,A)    = receive_next()).
  207: -define(RTT(M,F,A),   ?pRTT(_,M,F,A)   = receive_next()).
  208: -define(NM, receive_no_next(100)).
  209: 
  210: expect() ->
  211:     {Pid,_} = get(slave),
  212:     expect_receive(Pid).
  213: 
  214: expect(Msg) ->
  215:     {Pid,_} = get(slave),
  216:     expect_pid(Pid, Msg).
  217: 
  218: 
  219: 
  220: expect_pid(_Pid, []) ->
  221:     ok;
  222: expect_pid(Pid, [Line|T]) when is_integer(Line) ->
  223:     put(test_server_loc, {?MODULE,Line}),
  224:     expect_pid(Pid, T);
  225: expect_pid(Pid, [true|[_|_]=T]) ->
  226:     expect_pid(Pid, T);
  227: expect_pid(Pid, [false|[_|T]]) ->
  228:     expect_pid(Pid, T);
  229: expect_pid(Pid, [H|T]) ->
  230:     expect_pid(Pid, H),
  231:     expect_pid(Pid, T);
  232: expect_pid(Pid, Msg) when is_tuple(Msg) ->
  233:     same(Msg, expect_receive(Pid));
  234: expect_pid(Pid, Fun) when is_function(Fun, 1) ->
  235:     case Fun(expect_receive(Pid)) of
  236:         next ->
  237:             expect_pid(Pid, Fun);
  238:         done ->
  239:             ok;
  240:         Other ->
  241:             expect_pid(Pid, Other)
  242:     end.
  243: 
  244: expect_receive(Pid) when is_pid(Pid) ->
  245:     receive
  246:         Msg when is_tuple(Msg), 
  247:                  element(1, Msg) == trace, 
  248:                  element(2, Msg) =/= Pid;
  249:                  %%
  250:                  is_tuple(Msg), 
  251:                  element(1, Msg) == trace_ts, 
  252:                  element(2, Msg) =/= Pid ->
  253:             expect_receive(Pid);
  254:         Msg ->
  255:             expect_msg(Pid, Msg)
  256:     after 100 ->
  257:               {nm}
  258:     end.
  259: 
  260: expect_msg(P, ?pCT(P,M,F,Args))       -> {ct,{M,F},Args};
  261: expect_msg(P, ?pCTT(P,M,F,Args))      -> {ctt,{M,F},Args};
  262: expect_msg(P, ?pRF(P,M,F,Arity,V))    -> {rf,{M,F,Arity},V};
  263: expect_msg(P, ?pRFT(P,M,F,Arity,V))   -> {rft,{M,F,Arity},V};
  264: expect_msg(P, ?pEF(P,M,F,Arity,V))    -> {ef,{M,F,Arity},V};
  265: expect_msg(P, ?pEFT(P,M,F,Arity,V))   -> {eft,{M,F,Arity},V};
  266: expect_msg(P, ?pRT(P,M,F,Arity))      -> {rt,{M,F,Arity}};
  267: expect_msg(P, ?pRTT(P,M,F,Arity))     -> {rtt,{M,F,Arity}};
  268: expect_msg(P, Msg) when is_tuple(Msg) ->
  269:     case tuple_to_list(Msg) of
  270:         [trace,P|T] ->
  271:             list_to_tuple([trace|T]);
  272:         [trace_ts,P|[_|_]=T] ->
  273:             list_to_tuple([trace_ts|reverse(tl(reverse(T)))]);
  274:         _ ->
  275:             Msg
  276:     end.
  277: 
  278: same(A, B) ->
  279:     case [A|B] of
  280:         [X|X] ->
  281:             ok
  282:     end.
  283: 
  284: 
  285: 
  286: %%% tests %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  287: 
  288: basic_test() ->
  289:     setup([call]),
  290:     NumMatches = erlang:trace_pattern({?MODULE,'_','_'},[],[local]),
  291:     NumMatches = erlang:trace_pattern({?MODULE,'_','_'},[],[local]),
  292:     erlang:trace_pattern({?MODULE,slave,'_'},false,[local]),
  293:     [1,1,1,997] = apply_slave(?MODULE,exported_wrap,[1]),
  294:     ?CT(?MODULE,exported_wrap,[1]),
  295:     ?CT(?MODULE,exported,[1]),
  296:     ?CT(?MODULE,local,[1]),
  297:     ?CT(?MODULE,local2,[1]),
  298:     ?CT(?MODULE,local_tail,[1]),
  299:     erlang:trace_pattern({?MODULE,'_','_'},[],[]),
  300:     erlang:trace_pattern({?MODULE,slave,'_'},false,[local]),
  301:     [1,1,1,997] = apply_slave(?MODULE,exported_wrap,[1]),
  302:     ?CT(?MODULE,exported_wrap,[1]),
  303:     [1,1,1,997] = lambda_slave(fun() ->
  304:                                        exported_wrap(1)
  305:                                end),
  306:     ?NM,
  307:     erlang:trace_pattern({?MODULE,'_','_'},[],[local]),
  308:     erlang:trace_pattern({?MODULE,slave,'_'},false,[local]),
  309:     [1,1,1,997] = lambda_slave(fun() ->
  310:                                        exported_wrap(1)
  311:                                end),
  312:     ?CT(?MODULE,_,_), %% The fun
  313:     ?CT(?MODULE,exported_wrap,[1]),
  314:     ?CT(?MODULE,exported,[1]),
  315:     ?CT(?MODULE,local,[1]),
  316:     ?CT(?MODULE,local2,[1]),
  317:     ?CT(?MODULE,local_tail,[1]),
  318:     erlang:trace_pattern({?MODULE,'_','_'},false,[local]),
  319:     shutdown(),
  320:     ?NM,
  321:     ok.
  322: 
  323: %% OTP-7399.
  324: bit_syntax_test() ->
  325:     setup([call]),
  326:     erlang:trace_pattern({?MODULE,'_','_'},[],[local]),
  327:     erlang:trace_pattern({?MODULE,slave,'_'},false,[local]),
  328: 
  329:     lambda_slave(fun() ->
  330:                          6 = bs_sum_a(<<1,2,3>>, 0),
  331:                          10 = bs_sum_b(0, <<1,2,3,4>>),
  332:                          26 = bs_sum_c(<<3:4,5:4,7:4,11:4>>, 0)
  333:                  end),
  334:     ?CT(?MODULE,_,[]),		      %Ignore call to the fun.
  335: 
  336:     ?CT(?MODULE,bs_sum_a,[<<1,2,3>>,0]),
  337:     ?CT(?MODULE,bs_sum_a,[<<2,3>>,1]),
  338:     ?CT(?MODULE,bs_sum_a,[<<3>>,3]),
  339:     ?CT(?MODULE,bs_sum_a,[<<>>,6]),
  340: 
  341:     ?CT(?MODULE,bs_sum_b,[0,<<1,2,3,4>>]),
  342:     ?CT(?MODULE,bs_sum_b,[1,<<2,3,4>>]),
  343:     ?CT(?MODULE,bs_sum_b,[3,<<3,4>>]),
  344:     ?CT(?MODULE,bs_sum_b,[6,<<4>>]),
  345:     ?CT(?MODULE,bs_sum_b,[10,<<>>]),
  346: 
  347:     ?CT(?MODULE,bs_sum_c,[<<3:4,5:4,7:4,11:4>>, 0]),
  348:     ?CT(?MODULE,bs_sum_c,[<<5:4,7:4,11:4>>, 3]),
  349:     ?CT(?MODULE,bs_sum_c,[<<7:4,11:4>>, 8]),
  350:     ?CT(?MODULE,bs_sum_c,[<<11:4>>, 15]),
  351:     ?CT(?MODULE,bs_sum_c,[<<>>, 26]),
  352: 
  353:     erlang:trace_pattern({?MODULE,'_','_'},false,[local]),
  354:     shutdown(),
  355:     ?NM,
  356: 
  357:     ok.
  358: 
  359: bs_sum_a(<<H,T/binary>>, Acc) -> bs_sum_a(T, H+Acc);
  360: bs_sum_a(<<>>, Acc) -> Acc.
  361: 
  362: bs_sum_b(Acc, <<H,T/binary>>) -> bs_sum_b(H+Acc, T);
  363: bs_sum_b(Acc, <<>>) -> Acc.
  364: 
  365: bs_sum_c(<<H:4,T/bits>>, Acc) -> bs_sum_c(T, H+Acc);
  366: bs_sum_c(<<>>, Acc) -> Acc.
  367: 
  368: return_test() ->
  369:     setup([call]),
  370:     erlang:trace_pattern({?MODULE,'_','_'},[{'_',[],[{return_trace}]}],
  371:                          [local]),
  372:     erlang:trace_pattern({erlang,phash2,'_'},[{'_',[],[{return_trace}]}],
  373:                          [local]),
  374:     erlang:trace_pattern({?MODULE,slave,'_'},false,[local]),
  375:     [1,1,1,997] = apply_slave(?MODULE,exported_wrap,[1]),
  376:     ?CT(?MODULE,exported_wrap,[1]),
  377:     ?CT(?MODULE,exported,[1]),
  378:     ?CT(?MODULE,local,[1]),
  379:     ?CT(?MODULE,local2,[1]),
  380:     ?CT(?MODULE,local_tail,[1]),
  381:     ?CT(erlang,phash2,[1,1023]),
  382:     ?RF(erlang,phash2,2,997),
  383:     ?RF(?MODULE,local_tail,1,[1,997]),
  384:     ?RF(?MODULE,local2,1,[1,997]),
  385:     ?RF(?MODULE,local,1,[1,1,997]),
  386:     ?RF(?MODULE,exported,1,[1,1,1,997]),
  387:     ?RF(?MODULE,exported_wrap,1,[1,1,1,997]),
  388:     shutdown(),
  389:     setup([call,return_to]),
  390:     erlang:trace_pattern({?MODULE,'_','_'},[],
  391:                          [local]),
  392:     erlang:trace_pattern({erlang,phash2,'_'},[],
  393:                          [local]),
  394:     erlang:trace_pattern({?MODULE,slave,'_'},false,[local]),
  395:     [1,1,1,997] = apply_slave(?MODULE,exported_wrap,[1]),
  396:     ?CT(?MODULE,exported_wrap,[1]),
  397:     ?CT(?MODULE,exported,[1]),
  398:     ?CT(?MODULE,local,[1]),
  399:     ?CT(?MODULE,local2,[1]),
  400:     ?CT(?MODULE,local_tail,[1]),
  401:     ?CT(erlang,phash2,[1,1023]),
  402:     ?RT(?MODULE,local_tail,1),
  403:     ?RT(?MODULE,local,1),
  404:     ?RT(?MODULE,exported,1),
  405:     ?RT(?MODULE,slave,2),
  406:     shutdown(),
  407:     setup([call,return_to]),
  408:     erlang:trace_pattern({?MODULE,'_','_'},[{'_',[],[{return_trace}]}],
  409:                          [local]),
  410:     erlang:trace_pattern({erlang,phash2,'_'},[{'_',[],[{return_trace}]}],
  411:                          [local]),
  412:     erlang:trace_pattern({?MODULE,slave,'_'},false,[local]),
  413:     [1,1,1,997] = apply_slave(?MODULE,exported_wrap,[1]),
  414:     ?CT(?MODULE,exported_wrap,[1]),
  415:     ?CT(?MODULE,exported,[1]),
  416:     ?CT(?MODULE,local,[1]),
  417:     ?CT(?MODULE,local2,[1]),
  418:     ?CT(?MODULE,local_tail,[1]),
  419:     ?CT(erlang,phash2,[1,1023]),
  420:     ?RF(erlang,phash2,2,997),
  421:     ?RT(?MODULE,local_tail,1),
  422:     ?RF(?MODULE,local_tail,1,[1,997]),
  423:     ?RF(?MODULE,local2,1,[1,997]),
  424:     ?RT(?MODULE,local,1),
  425:     ?RF(?MODULE,local,1,[1,1,997]),
  426:     ?RT(?MODULE,exported,1),
  427:     ?RF(?MODULE,exported,1,[1,1,1,997]),
  428:     ?RF(?MODULE,exported_wrap,1,[1,1,1,997]),
  429:     ?RT(?MODULE,slave,2),
  430:     shutdown(),
  431:     ?NM,
  432: 
  433:     %% Test a regression where turning off return_to tracing
  434:     %% on yourself would cause a segfault.
  435:     Pid = setup([call,return_to]),
  436:     erlang:trace_pattern({'_','_','_'},[],[local]),
  437:     apply_slave(erlang,trace,[Pid, false, [all]]),
  438:     shutdown(),
  439:     ok.
  440: 
  441: on_and_off_test() ->
  442:     Pid = setup([call]),
  443:     1 = erlang:trace_pattern({?MODULE,local_tail,1},[],[local]),
  444:     erlang:trace_pattern({?MODULE,slave,'_'},false,[local]),
  445:     LocalTail = fun() ->
  446:                         local_tail(1)
  447:                 end,
  448:     [1,997] = lambda_slave(LocalTail),
  449:     ?CT(?MODULE,local_tail,[1]),
  450:     erlang:trace(Pid,true,[return_to]),
  451:     [1,997] = lambda_slave(LocalTail),
  452:     ?CT(?MODULE,local_tail,[1]),
  453:     ?RT(?MODULE,_,_),
  454:     0 = erlang:trace_pattern({?MODULE,local_tail,1},[],[global]),
  455:     [1,997] = lambda_slave(LocalTail),
  456:     ?NM,
  457:     1 = erlang:trace_pattern({?MODULE,exported_wrap,1},[],[global]),
  458:     [1,1,1,997] = apply_slave(?MODULE,exported_wrap,[1]),
  459:     ?CT(?MODULE,exported_wrap,[1]),
  460:     1 = erlang:trace_pattern({?MODULE,exported_wrap,1},[],[local]),
  461:     [1,1,1,997] = apply_slave(?MODULE,exported_wrap,[1]),
  462:     ?CT(?MODULE,exported_wrap,[1]),
  463:     ?RT(?MODULE,slave,2),
  464:     1 = erlang:trace_pattern({erlang,phash2,2},[],[local]),
  465:     [1,1,1,997] = apply_slave(?MODULE,exported_wrap,[1]),
  466:     ?CT(?MODULE,exported_wrap,[1]),
  467:     ?CT(erlang,phash2,[1,1023]),
  468:     ?RT(?MODULE,local_tail,1),
  469:     ?RT(?MODULE,slave,2),
  470:     erlang:trace(Pid,true,[timestamp]),
  471:     [1,1,1,997] = apply_slave(?MODULE,exported_wrap,[1]),
  472:     ?CTT(?MODULE,exported_wrap,[1]),
  473:     ?CTT(erlang,phash2,[1,1023]),
  474:     ?RTT(?MODULE,local_tail,1),
  475:     ?RTT(?MODULE,slave,2),
  476:     erlang:trace(Pid,false,[return_to,timestamp]),
  477:     [1,1,1,997] = apply_slave(?MODULE,exported_wrap,[1]),
  478:     ?CT(?MODULE,exported_wrap,[1]),
  479:     ?CT(erlang,phash2,[1,1023]),
  480:     erlang:trace(Pid,true,[return_to]),
  481:     1 = erlang:trace_pattern({erlang,phash2,2},[],[]),
  482:     [1,1,1,997] = apply_slave(?MODULE,exported_wrap,[1]),
  483:     ?CT(?MODULE,exported_wrap,[1]),
  484:     ?CT(erlang,phash2,[1,1023]),
  485:     ?RT(?MODULE,slave,2),
  486:     1 = erlang:trace_pattern({?MODULE,exported_wrap,1},[],[]),
  487:     [1,1,1,997] = apply_slave(?MODULE,exported_wrap,[1]),
  488:     ?CT(?MODULE,exported_wrap,[1]),
  489:     ?CT(erlang,phash2,[1,1023]),
  490:     shutdown(),
  491:     erlang:trace_pattern({'_','_','_'},false,[local]),
  492:     N = erlang:trace_pattern({erlang,'_','_'},true,[local]),
  493:     case erlang:trace_pattern({erlang,'_','_'},false,[local]) of
  494:         N ->
  495:             ok;
  496:         Else ->
  497:             exit({number_mismatch, {expected, N}, {got, Else}})
  498:     end,
  499:     case erlang:trace_pattern({erlang,'_','_'},false,[local]) of
  500:         N ->
  501:             ok;
  502:         Else2 ->
  503:             exit({number_mismatch, {expected, N}, {got, Else2}})
  504:     end,
  505:     M = erlang:trace_pattern({erlang,'_','_'},true,[]),
  506:     case erlang:trace_pattern({erlang,'_','_'},false,[]) of
  507:         M ->
  508:             ok;
  509:         Else3 ->
  510:             exit({number_mismatch, {expected, N}, {got, Else3}})
  511:     end,
  512:     case erlang:trace_pattern({erlang,'_','_'},false,[]) of
  513:         M ->
  514:             ok;
  515:         Else4 ->
  516:             exit({number_mismatch, {expected, N}, {got, Else4}})
  517:     end,
  518:     ?NM,
  519:     ok.
  520: 
  521: systematic_on_off(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  522:     setup([call]),
  523:     Local = combinations([local,meta,call_count,call_time]),
  524:     [systematic_on_off_1(Flags) || Flags <- Local],
  525: 
  526:     %% Make sure that we don't get any trace messages when trace
  527:     %% is supposed to be off.
  528:     receive_no_next(500).
  529: 
  530: systematic_on_off_1(Local) ->
  531:     io:format("~p\n", [Local]),
  532: 
  533:     %% Global off.
  534:     verify_trace_info(false, []),
  535:     1 = erlang:trace_pattern({?MODULE,exported_wrap,1}, true, Local),
  536:     verify_trace_info(false, Local),
  537:     1 = erlang:trace_pattern({?MODULE,exported_wrap,1}, false, [global]),
  538:     verify_trace_info(false, Local),
  539:     1 = erlang:trace_pattern({?MODULE,exported_wrap,1}, false, Local),
  540:     verify_trace_info(false, []),
  541: 
  542:     %% Global on.
  543:     1 = erlang:trace_pattern({?MODULE,exported_wrap,1}, true, [global]),
  544:     verify_trace_info(true, []),
  545:     1 = erlang:trace_pattern({?MODULE,exported_wrap,1}, false, Local),
  546:     verify_trace_info(true, []),
  547:     1 = erlang:trace_pattern({?MODULE,exported_wrap,1}, false, [global]),
  548:     verify_trace_info(false, []),
  549: 
  550:     %% Implicitly turn off global call trace.
  551:     1 = erlang:trace_pattern({?MODULE,exported_wrap,1}, true, [global]),
  552:     verify_trace_info(true, []),
  553:     1 = erlang:trace_pattern({?MODULE,exported_wrap,1}, true, Local),
  554:     verify_trace_info(false, Local),
  555: 
  556:     %% Implicitly turn off local call trace.
  557:     1 = erlang:trace_pattern({?MODULE,exported_wrap,1}, true, [global]),
  558:     verify_trace_info(true, []),
  559: 
  560:     %% Turn off global call trace. Everything should be off now.
  561:     1 = erlang:trace_pattern({?MODULE,exported_wrap,1}, false, [global]),
  562:     verify_trace_info(false, []),
  563: 
  564:     ok.
  565: 
  566: verify_trace_info(Global, Local) ->
  567:     case erlang:trace_info({?MODULE,exported_wrap,1}, all) of
  568:         {all,false} ->
  569:             false = Global,
  570:             [] = Local;
  571:         {all,Ps} ->
  572:             io:format("~p\n", [Ps]),
  573:             [verify_trace_info(P, Global, Local) || P <- Ps]
  574:     end,
  575:     global_call(Global, Local),
  576:     local_call(Local),
  577:     ok.
  578: 
  579: verify_trace_info({traced,global}, true, []) -> ok;
  580: verify_trace_info({traced,local}, false, _) -> ok;
  581: verify_trace_info({match_spec,[]}, _, _) -> ok;
  582: verify_trace_info({meta_match_spec,[]}, _, _) -> ok;
  583: verify_trace_info({LocalFlag,Bool}, _, Local) when is_boolean(Bool) ->
  584:     try
  585:         Bool = lists:member(LocalFlag, Local)
  586:     catch
  587:         error:_ ->
  588:             ct:fail("Line ~p: {~p,~p}, false, ~p\n", [?LINE,LocalFlag,Bool,Local])
  589:     end;
  590: verify_trace_info({meta,Pid}, false, Local) when is_pid(Pid) ->
  591:     true = lists:member(meta, Local);
  592: verify_trace_info({call_time,_}, false, Local) ->
  593:     true = lists:member(call_time, Local);
  594: verify_trace_info({call_count,_}, false, Local) ->
  595:     true = lists:member(call_time, Local).
  596: 
  597: global_call(Global, Local) ->
  598:     apply_slave(?MODULE, exported_wrap, [global_call]),
  599:     case Global of
  600:         false ->
  601:             recv_local_call(Local, [global_call]);
  602:         true ->
  603:             ?CT(?MODULE, exported_wrap, [global_call])
  604:     end.
  605: 
  606: local_call(Local) ->
  607:     lambda_slave(fun() -> exported_wrap(local_call) end),
  608:     recv_local_call(Local, [local_call]).
  609: 
  610: recv_local_call(Local, Args) ->
  611:     case lists:member(local, Local) of
  612:         false ->
  613:             ok;
  614:         true ->
  615:             ?CT(?MODULE, exported_wrap, Args)
  616:     end,
  617:     case lists:member(meta, Local) of
  618:         false ->
  619:             ok;
  620:         true ->
  621:             ?CTT(?MODULE, exported_wrap, Args)
  622:     end,
  623:     ok.
  624: 
  625: combinations([_]=One) ->
  626:     [One];
  627: combinations([H|T]) ->
  628:     Cs = combinations(T),
  629:     [[H|C] || C <- Cs] ++ Cs.
  630: 
  631: stack_grow_test() ->    
  632:     setup([call,return_to]),
  633:     1 = erlang:trace_pattern({?MODULE,loop,4},
  634:                              [{'_',[],[{return_trace}]}],[local]),
  635:     erlang:trace_pattern({?MODULE,slave,'_'},false,[local]),
  636:     Num = 1 bsl 15,
  637:     Fun = 
  638:     fun(_F,0) -> ok; 
  639:        (F,N) -> 
  640:             receive _A -> 
  641:                         receive _B -> 
  642:                                     receive _C ->
  643:                                                 F(F,N-1) 
  644:                                     end
  645:                         end 
  646:             end 
  647:     end, 
  648:     apply_slave_async(?MODULE,loop,[{hej,hopp},[a,b,c],4.5,Num]),
  649:     Fun(Fun,Num + 1),
  650:     ?NM, 
  651:     ok.
  652: 
  653: 
  654: info_test() ->
  655:     Flags1 = lists:sort([call,return_to]),
  656:     Pid = setup(Flags1),
  657:     Prog = [{['$1'],[{is_integer,'$1'}],[{message, false}]},
  658:             {'_',[],[]}],
  659:     erlang:trace_pattern({?MODULE,exported_wrap,1},Prog,[local]),
  660:     erlang:trace_pattern({?MODULE,slave,'_'},false,[local]),
  661:     Self = self(),
  662:     {flags,L} = erlang:trace_info(Pid,flags),
  663:     case lists:sort(L) of
  664:         Flags1 ->
  665:             ok;
  666:         Wrong1 ->
  667:             exit({bad_result, {erlang,trace_info,[Pid,flags]},
  668:                   {expected, Flags1}, {got, Wrong1}})
  669:     end,
  670:     {tracer,Tracer} = erlang:trace_info(Pid,tracer),
  671:     case Tracer of
  672:         Self ->
  673:             ok;
  674:         Wrong2 ->
  675:             exit({bad_result, {erlang,trace_info,[Pid,tracer]},
  676:                   {expected, Self}, {got, Wrong2}})
  677:     end,
  678:     {traced,local} = erlang:trace_info({?MODULE,exported_wrap,1},traced),
  679:     {match_spec, MS} = 
  680:     erlang:trace_info({?MODULE,exported_wrap,1},match_spec),
  681:     case MS of
  682:         Prog ->
  683:             ok;
  684:         Wrong3 ->
  685:             exit({bad_result, {erlang,trace_info,
  686:                                [{?MODULE,exported_wrap,1},
  687:                                 match_spec]},
  688:                   {expected, Prog}, {got, Wrong3}})
  689:     end,
  690:     erlang:garbage_collect(self()),
  691:     receive
  692:     after 1 ->
  693:               ok
  694:     end,
  695:     io:format("~p~n",[MS]),
  696:     {match_spec,MS2} = 
  697:     erlang:trace_info({?MODULE,exported_wrap,1},match_spec),
  698:     io:format("~p~n",[MS2]),
  699:     erlang:trace_pattern({?MODULE,exported_wrap,1},[],[]),
  700:     {traced,global} = 
  701:     erlang:trace_info({?MODULE,exported_wrap,1},traced),
  702:     {match_spec,[]} = 
  703:     erlang:trace_info({?MODULE,exported_wrap,1},match_spec),
  704:     {traced,undefined} = 
  705:     erlang:trace_info({?MODULE,exported_wrap,2},traced),
  706:     {match_spec,undefined} = 
  707:     erlang:trace_info({?MODULE,exported_wrap,2},match_spec),
  708:     {traced,false} = erlang:trace_info({?MODULE,exported,1},traced),
  709:     {match_spec,false} = 
  710:     erlang:trace_info({?MODULE,exported,1},match_spec),
  711:     shutdown(),
  712:     ok.
  713: 
  714: delete_test(Config) ->
  715:     Priv = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  716:     Data = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  717:     File = filename:join(Data, "trace_local_dummy"),
  718:     {ok,trace_local_dummy} = c:c(File, [{outdir,Priv}]),
  719:     code:purge(trace_local_dummy),
  720:     code:delete(trace_local_dummy),
  721:     0 = erlang:trace_pattern({trace_local_dummy,'_','_'},true,[local]),
  722:     ?NM,
  723:     ok.
  724: 
  725: 
  726: 
  727: %%% exception_test %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  728: 
  729: exception_test(Opts) ->
  730:     {ProcFlags,PatFlags} = 
  731:     case proplists:get_bool(meta, Opts) of
  732:         true  -> {[timestamp],[meta]};
  733:         false -> {[call,return_to,timestamp],[local]}
  734:     end,
  735:     case proplists:get_bool(nocatch, Opts) of
  736:         false ->
  737:             Exceptions = exceptions(),
  738:             exception_test_setup(ProcFlags, PatFlags),
  739:             lists:foreach(
  740:               fun ({Func,Args}) ->
  741:                       exception_test(Opts, Func, Args)
  742:               end,
  743:               Exceptions),
  744:             shutdown();
  745:         true ->
  746:             Exceptions = exceptions(),
  747:             try
  748:                 %% suppress  =ERROR REPORT=== emulator messages
  749:                 ok = logger:add_primary_filter(suppress_log_spam, {
  750:                     fun(#{meta := #{error_logger := #{emulator := true, tag := error}}}, _) ->
  751:                         stop;
  752:                     (_Meta, _Msg) ->
  753:                         ignore
  754:                     end, ok}),
  755:                 lists:foreach(
  756:                   fun ({Func,Args}) ->
  757:                           exception_test_setup(
  758:                             [procs|ProcFlags],
  759:                             PatFlags),
  760:                           exception_test(Opts, Func, Args),
  761:                           shutdown()
  762:                   end,
  763:                   Exceptions)
  764:             after
  765:                 %% remove the suppression for ERROR REPORTS
  766:                 ok = logger:remove_primary_filter(suppress_log_spam)
  767:             end
  768:     end,
  769:     ok.
  770: 
  771: exceptions() ->
  772:     Ref = make_ref(),
  773:     N   = 200000,
  774:     LiL = seq(1, N-1, N),	% Long Improper List
  775:     LL  = seq(1, N, []),  	% Long List
  776:     [{{erlang,exit},  [done]},
  777:      {{erlang,error}, [1.0]},
  778:      {{erlang,error}, [Ref,[]]},
  779:      {{erlang,throw}, [4711]},
  780:      {{erlang,'++'},    [[17],seventeen]},
  781:      {{erlang,'++'},    [Ref,[125.125]]},
  782:      {{?MODULE,match},  [ref,Ref]},
  783:      {{?MODULE,match},  [Ref,Ref]},
  784:      {{?MODULE,clause}, [ref,Ref]},
  785:      {{?MODULE,clause}, [Ref,Ref]},
  786:      {{?MODULE,id},     [4711.0]},
  787:      {{?MODULE,undef},  [[Ref|Ref]]},
  788:      {{?MODULE,lists_reverse}, [LiL,[]]},
  789:      {{?MODULE,lists_reverse}, [LL,[]]}].
  790: 
  791: exception_test_setup(ProcFlags, PatFlags) ->
  792:     Pid = setup(ProcFlags),
  793:     ct:log("=== exception_test_setup(~p, ~p): ~p~n",
  794:               [ProcFlags,PatFlags,Pid]),
  795:     Mprog = [{'_',[],[{exception_trace}]}],
  796:     erlang:trace_pattern({?MODULE,'_','_'}, Mprog, PatFlags),
  797:     erlang:trace_pattern({?MODULE,slave,'_'},false,PatFlags),
  798:     [1,1,1,1,1] =
  799:     [erlang:trace_pattern({erlang,F,A}, Mprog, PatFlags)
  800:      || {F,A} <- [{exit,1},{error,1},{error,2},{throw,1},{'++',2}]],
  801:     1 = erlang:trace_pattern({lists,reverse,2}, Mprog, PatFlags),
  802:     ok.
  803: 
  804: -record(exc_opts, {nocatch=false, meta=false}).
  805: 
  806: exception_test(Opts, Func0, Args0) ->
  807:     ct:log("=== exception_test(~p, ~p, ~p)~n",
  808:               [Opts,Func0,abbr(Args0)]),
  809:     Apply = proplists:get_bool(apply, Opts),
  810:     Function = proplists:get_bool(function, Opts),
  811:     Nocatch = proplists:get_bool(nocatch, Opts),
  812:     Meta = proplists:get_bool(meta, Opts),
  813:     ExcOpts = #exc_opts{nocatch=Nocatch,meta=Meta},
  814: 
  815:     %% Func0 and Args0 are for the innermost call, now we will
  816:     %% wrap them in wrappers...
  817:     {Func1,Args1} =
  818:         case Function of
  819:             true  -> {fun(F, As) -> exc(F, As) end, [Func0,Args0]};
  820:             false -> {Func0,Args0}
  821:         end,
  822: 
  823:     {Func,Args} = 
  824:         case Apply of
  825:             true  -> {{erlang,apply},[Func1,Args1]};
  826:             false -> {Func1,Args1}
  827:         end,
  828: 
  829:     R1 = exc_slave(ExcOpts, Func, Args),
  830:     Stack2 = [{?MODULE,exc_top,3,[]},{?MODULE,slave,2,[]}],
  831:     Stack3 = [{?MODULE,exc,2,[]}|Stack2],
  832:     Rs = 
  833:     case x_exc_top(ExcOpts, Func, Args) of % Emulation
  834:         {crash,{Reason,Stack}}=R when is_list(Stack) ->
  835:             [R,
  836:              {crash,{Reason,Stack++Stack2}},
  837:              {crash,{Reason,Stack++Stack3}}];
  838:         R ->
  839:             [R]
  840:     end,
  841:     exception_validate(R1, Rs),
  842:     case R1 of
  843:         {crash,Crash} ->
  844:             expect({trace_ts,exit,Crash});
  845:         _ when not Meta ->
  846:             expect({rtt,{?MODULE,slave,2}});
  847:         _ ->
  848:             ok
  849:     end,
  850:     expect({nm}).
  851: 
  852: exception_validate(R0, Rs0) ->
  853:     R = clean_location(R0),
  854:     Rs = [clean_location(E) || E <- Rs0],
  855:     exception_validate_1(R, Rs).
  856: 
  857: exception_validate_1(R1, [R2|Rs]) ->
  858:     case [R1|R2] of
  859:         [R|R] ->
  860:             ok;
  861:         [{crash,{badarg,[{lists,reverse,[L1a,L1b],_}|T]}}|
  862:          {crash,{badarg,[{lists,reverse,[L2a,L2b],_}|T]}}] ->
  863:             same({crash,{badarg,[{lists,reverse,
  864:                                   [lists:reverse(L1b, L1a),[]],[]}|T]}},
  865:                  {crash,{badarg,[{lists,reverse,
  866:                                   [lists:reverse(L2b, L2a),[]],[]}|T]}});
  867:         _ when is_list(Rs), Rs =/= [] ->
  868:             exception_validate(R1, Rs)
  869:     end.
  870: 
  871: clean_location({crash,{Reason,Stk0}}) ->
  872:     Stk = [{M,F,A,[]} || {M,F,A,_} <- Stk0],
  873:     {crash,{Reason,Stk}};
  874: clean_location(Term) -> Term.
  875: 
  876: concurrency(_Config) ->
  877:     N = erlang:system_info(schedulers),
  878: 
  879:     %% Spawn 2*N processes that spin in a tight infinite loop,
  880:     %% and one process that will turn on and off local call
  881:     %% trace on the infinite_loop/0 function. We expect the
  882:     %% emulator to crash if there is a memory barrier bug or
  883:     %% if an aligned word-sized write is not atomic.
  884: 
  885:     Ps0 = [spawn_monitor(fun() -> infinite_loop() end) ||
  886:            _ <- lists:seq(1, 2*N)],
  887:     OnAndOff = fun() -> concurrency_on_and_off() end,
  888:     Ps1 = [spawn_monitor(OnAndOff)|Ps0],
  889:     timer:sleep(1000),
  890: 
  891:     %% Now spawn off N more processes that turn on off and off
  892:     %% a local trace pattern.
  893:     Ps = [spawn_monitor(OnAndOff) || _ <- lists:seq(1, N)] ++ Ps1,
  894:     timer:sleep(1000),
  895: 
  896:     %% Clean up.
  897:     [exit(Pid, kill) || {Pid,_} <- Ps],
  898:     [receive
  899:          {'DOWN',Ref,process,Pid,killed} -> ok
  900:      end || {Pid,Ref} <- Ps],
  901:     erlang:trace_pattern({?MODULE,infinite_loop,0}, false, [local]),
  902:     ok.
  903: 
  904: concurrency_on_and_off() ->
  905:     1 = erlang:trace_pattern({?MODULE,infinite_loop,0}, true, [local]),
  906:     1 = erlang:trace_pattern({?MODULE,infinite_loop,0}, false, [local]),
  907:     concurrency_on_and_off().
  908: 
  909: infinite_loop() ->
  910:     infinite_loop().
  911: 
  912: %%% Tracee target functions %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  913: %%%
  914: 
  915: loop(D1,D2,D3,0) ->
  916:     io:format("~p~n",[[D1,D2,D3]]),
  917:     0;
  918: loop(D1,D2,D3,N) ->
  919:     max(N,loop(D1,D2,D3,N-1)).
  920: 
  921: exported_wrap(Val) ->
  922:     exported(Val).
  923: 
  924: exported(Val) ->
  925:     [Val | local(Val)]. %% Non tail recursive local call
  926: 
  927: local(Val) ->
  928:     [Val | local2(Val)]. %% Non tail recursive local call
  929: 
  930: local2(Val) ->
  931:     local_tail(Val). %% Tail recursive call
  932: 
  933: local_tail(Val) ->
  934:     [Val , erlang:phash2(1,1023)].
  935: 
  936: 
  937: 
  938: %%% exc_slave/3 tracee target functions %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  939: %%%
  940: 
  941: exc_top(ExcOpts, Func, Args) ->
  942:     case ExcOpts#exc_opts.nocatch of
  943:         false ->
  944:             try exc_jump(Func, Args) of
  945:                 Value ->
  946:                     {value,Value}
  947:             catch
  948:                 Class:Reason ->
  949:                     {Class,Reason}
  950:             end;
  951:         true ->
  952:             {value,exc_jump(Func, Args)}
  953:     end.
  954: 
  955: %% x_* functions emulate the non-x_* ones.
  956: %% x_* functions below x_exc_top
  957: %% return {value,Value} or {Class,Reason}.
  958: %% The only possible place for exception
  959: %% is below exc/2.
  960: x_exc_top(ExcOpts, Func, Args) ->
  961:     Rtt = not ExcOpts#exc_opts.meta,
  962:     expect({ctt,{?MODULE,exc_top},[ExcOpts,Func,Args]}),
  963:     case x_exc_jump(ExcOpts, Func, Args) of
  964:         Result when not ExcOpts#exc_opts.nocatch ->
  965:             expect([Rtt,{rtt,{?MODULE,exc_top,3}},
  966:                     ?LINE,{rft,{?MODULE,exc_top,3},Result}]),
  967:             Result;
  968:         {value,_}=Result ->
  969: 
  970:             expect([Rtt,{rtt,{?MODULE,exc_top,3}},
  971:                     ?LINE,{rft,{?MODULE,exc_top,3},Result}]),
  972:             Result;
  973:         {exit,Reason}=CR ->
  974:             expect({eft,{?MODULE,exc_top,3},CR}),
  975:             {crash,Reason};
  976:         {error,Reason}=CR ->
  977:             expect({eft,{?MODULE,exc_top,3},CR}),
  978:             {crash,{Reason,x_exc_stacktrace()}};
  979:         CR ->
  980:             expect({eft,{?MODULE,exc_top,3},CR}),
  981:             {crash,CR}
  982:     end.
  983: 
  984: exc_jump(Func, Args) ->
  985:     exc(Func, Args, jump).
  986: 
  987: x_exc_jump(ExcOpts, Func, Args) ->
  988:     expect({ctt,{?MODULE,exc_jump},[Func,Args]}),
  989:     case x_exc(ExcOpts, Func, Args, jump) of
  990:         {value,Value}=Result ->
  991:             expect({rft,{?MODULE,exc_jump,2},Value}),
  992:             Result;
  993:         CR ->
  994:             expect({eft,{?MODULE,exc_jump,2},CR}),
  995:             CR
  996:     end.
  997: 
  998: exc(Func, Args, jump) ->
  999:     exc(Func, Args, do);
 1000: exc(Func, Args, do) ->
 1001:     exc(Func, Args).
 1002: 
 1003: x_exc(ExcOpts, Func, Args, jump) ->
 1004:     expect({ctt,{?MODULE,exc},[Func,Args,jump]}),
 1005:     case x_exc(ExcOpts, Func, Args, do) of
 1006:         {value,Value}=Result ->
 1007:             expect({rft,{?MODULE,exc,3},Value}),
 1008:             Result;
 1009:         CR ->
 1010:             expect({eft,{?MODULE,exc,3},CR}),
 1011:             CR
 1012:     end;
 1013: x_exc(ExcOpts, Func, Args, do) ->
 1014:     expect({ctt,{?MODULE,exc},[Func,Args,do]}),
 1015:     case x_exc(ExcOpts, Func, Args) of
 1016:         {value,Value}=Result ->
 1017:             expect({rft,{?MODULE,exc,3},Value}),
 1018:             Result;
 1019:         CR ->
 1020:             expect({eft,{?MODULE,exc,3},CR}),
 1021:             CR
 1022:     end.
 1023: 
 1024: exc({erlang,apply}, [{M,F},A]) ->
 1025:     erlang:apply(M, F, id(A));
 1026: exc({erlang,apply}, [F,A]) ->
 1027:     erlang:apply(F, id(A));
 1028: exc({erlang,error}, [E]) ->
 1029:     erlang:error(id(E));
 1030: exc({erlang,error}, [E,S]) ->
 1031:     erlang:error(E, id(S));
 1032: exc({erlang,exit}, [E]) ->
 1033:     erlang:exit(id(E));
 1034: exc({erlang,throw}, [E]) ->
 1035:     erlang:throw(id(E));
 1036: exc({erlang,'++'}, [A,B]) ->
 1037:     erlang:'++'(A, id(B));
 1038: exc({?MODULE,match}, [A,B]) ->
 1039:     match(A, id(B));
 1040: exc({?MODULE,clause}, [A,B]) ->
 1041:     clause(A, id(B));
 1042: exc({?MODULE,id}, [E]) ->
 1043:     id(id(E));
 1044: exc({?MODULE,undef}, [E]) ->
 1045:     undef(id(E));
 1046: exc({?MODULE,lists_reverse}, [A,B]) ->
 1047:     lists_reverse(A, id(B));
 1048: exc(Func, [A,B]) when is_function(Func, 2) ->
 1049:     Func(A, id(B)).
 1050: 
 1051: x_exc(ExcOpts, {erlang,apply}=Func0, [{_,_}=Func,Args]=Args0) ->
 1052:     expect({ctt,{?MODULE,exc},[Func0,Args0]}),
 1053:     x_exc_body(ExcOpts, Func, Args, true);
 1054: x_exc(ExcOpts, {erlang,apply}=Func0, [Func,Args]=Args0) 
 1055:   when is_function(Func, 2)->
 1056:     expect({ctt,{?MODULE,exc},[Func0,Args0]}),
 1057:     x_exc_func(ExcOpts, Func, Args, Args);
 1058: x_exc(ExcOpts, {_,_}=Func, Args) ->
 1059:     expect({ctt,{?MODULE,exc},[Func,Args]}),
 1060:     x_exc_body(ExcOpts, Func, Args, false);
 1061: x_exc(ExcOpts, Func0, [_,Args]=Args0)
 1062:   when is_function(Func0, 2) ->
 1063:     expect({ctt,{?MODULE,exc},[Func0,Args0]}),
 1064:     x_exc_func(ExcOpts, Func0, Args0, Args).
 1065: 
 1066: x_exc_func(ExcOpts, Func, [Func1,Args1]=Args, Id) ->
 1067:     %% Assumes the called fun =:= fun exc/2,
 1068:     %% will utterly fail otherwise.
 1069:     Rtt = not ExcOpts#exc_opts.meta,
 1070:     {module,M} = erlang:fun_info(Func, module),
 1071:     {name,F} = erlang:fun_info(Func, name),
 1072:     expect([{ctt,{?MODULE,id},[Id]},
 1073:             ?LINE,{rft,{?MODULE,id,1},Id},
 1074:             ?LINE,Rtt,{rtt,{?MODULE,exc,2}},
 1075:             ?LINE,{ctt,{M,F},Args}]),
 1076:     case x_exc(ExcOpts, Func1, Args1) of
 1077:         {value,Value}=Result ->
 1078:             expect([{rft,{M,F,2},Value},
 1079:                     ?LINE,{rft,{?MODULE,exc,2},Value}]),
 1080:             Result;
 1081:         CR ->
 1082:             expect([{eft,{M,F,2},CR},
 1083:                     ?LINE,{eft,{?MODULE,exc,2},CR}]),
 1084:             CR
 1085:     end.
 1086: 
 1087: x_exc_body(ExcOpts, {M,F}=Func, Args, Apply) ->
 1088:     Nocatch = ExcOpts#exc_opts.nocatch,
 1089:     Rtt = not ExcOpts#exc_opts.meta,
 1090:     Id = case Apply of
 1091:              true  -> Args;
 1092:              false -> lists:last(Args)
 1093:          end,
 1094:     expect([{ctt,{?MODULE,id},[Id]},
 1095:             ?LINE,{rft,{?MODULE,id,1},Id},
 1096:             ?LINE,Rtt,{rtt,{?MODULE,exc,2}},
 1097:             ?LINE,{ctt,{M,F},Args}]),
 1098:     Arity = length(Args),
 1099:     try exc(Func, Args) of
 1100:         Value ->
 1101:             x_exc_value(Rtt, M, F, Args, Arity, Value),
 1102:             case expect() of
 1103:                 {rtt,{M,F,Arity}} when Rtt, Apply ->
 1104:                     %% We may get the above when
 1105:                     %% applying a BIF.
 1106:                     expect({rft,{?MODULE,exc,2},Value});
 1107:                 {rtt,{?MODULE,exc,2}} when Rtt, not Apply ->
 1108:                     %% We may get the above when
 1109:                     %% calling a BIF.
 1110:                     expect({rft,{?MODULE,exc,2},Value});
 1111:                 {rft,{?MODULE,exc,2},Value} ->
 1112:                     ok
 1113:             end,
 1114:             {value,Value}
 1115:     catch
 1116:         throw:Thrown:Stk when Nocatch ->
 1117:             put(get_stacktrace, Stk),
 1118:             CR = {error,{nocatch,Thrown}},
 1119:             x_exc_exception(Rtt, M, F, Args, Arity, CR),
 1120:             expect({eft,{?MODULE,exc,2},CR}),
 1121:             CR;
 1122:         Class:Reason:Stk ->
 1123:             put(get_stacktrace, Stk),
 1124:             CR = {Class,Reason},
 1125:             x_exc_exception(Rtt, M, F, Args, Arity, CR),
 1126:             expect({eft,{?MODULE,exc,2},CR}),
 1127:             CR
 1128:     end.
 1129: 
 1130: x_exc_value(Rtt, ?MODULE, lists_reverse, [La,Lb], 2, R) ->
 1131:     L = lists:reverse(Lb, La),
 1132:     expect([fun ({ctt,{lists,reverse},[L1,L2]}) ->
 1133:                     same(L, lists:reverse(L2, L1)),
 1134:                     next;
 1135:                 (Msg) ->
 1136:                     same({rft,{lists,reverse,2},R}, Msg),
 1137:                     same(R, lists:reverse(L, [])),
 1138:                     done
 1139:             end,
 1140:             ?LINE,Rtt,{rtt,{?MODULE,lists_reverse,2}},
 1141:             ?LINE,{rft,{?MODULE,lists_reverse,2},R}]);
 1142: x_exc_value(_Rtt, M, F, _, Arity, Value) ->
 1143:     expect({rft,{M,F,Arity},Value}).
 1144: 
 1145: x_exc_exception(_Rtt, ?MODULE, lists_reverse, [La,Lb], 2, CR) ->
 1146:     L = lists:reverse(Lb, La),
 1147:     expect([fun ({ctt,{lists,reverse},[L1,L2]}) ->
 1148:                     same(L, lists:reverse(L2, L1)),
 1149:                     next;
 1150:                 (Msg) ->
 1151:                     same({eft,{lists,reverse,2},CR}, Msg),
 1152:                     done
 1153:             end,
 1154:             ?LINE,{eft,{?MODULE,lists_reverse,2},CR}]);
 1155: x_exc_exception(Rtt, ?MODULE, undef, [_], 1, {Class,Reason}=CR) ->
 1156:     expect([{ctt,{erlang,Class},[Reason]},
 1157:             ?LINE,{eft,{erlang,Class,1},CR},
 1158:             ?LINE,Rtt,{rtt,{error_handler,crash,1}},
 1159:             ?LINE,{eft,{?MODULE,undef,1},CR}]);
 1160: x_exc_exception(_Rtt, M, F, _, Arity, CR) ->
 1161:     expect({eft,{M,F,Arity},CR}).
 1162: 
 1163: x_exc_stacktrace() ->
 1164:     x_exc_stacktrace(get(get_stacktrace)).
 1165: 
 1166: %% Truncate stacktrace to below exc/2
 1167: x_exc_stacktrace([{?MODULE,x_exc,4,_}|_]) -> [];
 1168: x_exc_stacktrace([{?MODULE,x_exc_func,4,_}|_]) -> [];
 1169: x_exc_stacktrace([{?MODULE,x_exc_body,4,_}|_]) -> [];
 1170: x_exc_stacktrace([{?MODULE,exc,2,_}|_]) -> [];
 1171: x_exc_stacktrace([H|T]) ->
 1172:     [H|x_exc_stacktrace(T)].
 1173: 
 1174: 
 1175: 
 1176: match(A, B) ->
 1177:     A = B.
 1178: 
 1179: clause(A, A) ->
 1180:     A.
 1181: 
 1182: id(Id) ->
 1183:     Id.
 1184: 
 1185: undef(X) ->
 1186:     ?MODULE:undef(X, X). % undef
 1187: 
 1188: lists_reverse(A, B) ->
 1189:     Res = lists:reverse(A, B),
 1190:     _ = (catch abs(A)),
 1191:     Res.
 1192: 
 1193: 
 1194: 
 1195: %%% Tracee (slave) handling %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 1196: %%%
 1197: 
 1198: slave(Dest, Sync) ->
 1199:     Dest ! Sync,
 1200:     receive
 1201:         {From,Tag,{apply,M,F,A}} when is_pid(From) ->
 1202:             ?dbgformat("Apply: ~p:~p/~p (~p)~n",[M,F,length(A),A]),
 1203:             Res = apply(M,F,A),
 1204:             ?dbgformat("done Apply: ~p:~p/~p (~p)~n",[M,F,length(A),A]),
 1205:             From ! {Tag,Res},
 1206:             slave(From, Tag);
 1207:         {From,Tag,{lambda,Fun}} when is_pid(From) ->
 1208:             Res = Fun(),
 1209:             From ! {Tag,Res},
 1210:             slave(From, Tag);
 1211:         {From,Tag,{exc_top,Catch,Func,Args}} when is_pid(From) ->
 1212:             ?dbgformat("Exc: ~p ~p~p ~n",[Catch,Func,Args]),
 1213:             Res = exc_top(Catch, Func, Args),
 1214:             ?dbgformat("done Exc: ~p ~p~p ~n",[Catch,Func,Args]),
 1215:             From ! {Tag,Res},
 1216:             slave(From,Tag);
 1217:         die ->
 1218:             exit(normal)
 1219:     end.
 1220: 
 1221: setup(ProcFlags) ->
 1222:     trace_off(),
 1223:     flush(100),
 1224:     Self = self(),
 1225:     Sync = make_ref(),
 1226:     Pid = spawn(fun () -> slave(Self, Sync) end),
 1227:     Mref = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
 1228:     receive 
 1229:         Sync ->
 1230:             put(slave, {Pid,Mref}),
 1231:             case ProcFlags of
 1232:                 [] -> ok;
 1233:                 _ ->
 1234:                     erlang:trace(Pid, true, ProcFlags)
 1235:             end,
 1236:             Pid
 1237:     end.
 1238: 
 1239: shutdown() ->
 1240:     trace_off(),
 1241:     case get(slave) of
 1242:         {Pid,Mref} ->
 1243:             try erlang:is_process_alive(Pid) of
 1244:                 true ->
 1245:                     Pid ! die,
 1246:                     receive
 1247:                         {'DOWN',Mref,process,Pid,Reason} ->
 1248:                             Reason
 1249:                     end;
 1250:                 _ ->
 1251:                     not_alive
 1252:             catch _:_ ->
 1253:                     undefined
 1254:             end;
 1255:         _ ->
 1256:             undefined
 1257:     end.
 1258: 
 1259: trace_off() ->
 1260:     erlang:trace_pattern({'_','_','_'},false,[]),
 1261:     erlang:trace_pattern({'_','_','_'},false,[local]),
 1262:     erlang:trace_pattern({'_','_','_'},false,[meta]),
 1263:     erlang:trace(all, false, [all]).
 1264: 
 1265: 
 1266: apply_slave_async(M,F,A) ->
 1267:     {Pid,Mref} = get(slave),
 1268:     spawn(?MODULE,apply_slave_async,[M,F,A,Pid,Mref]),
 1269:     Pid.
 1270: 
 1271: apply_slave_async(M,F,A,Pid,Mref) ->
 1272:     Tag = make_ref(),
 1273:     Pid ! {self(),Tag,{apply,M,F,A}},
 1274:     result(Tag, Mref).
 1275: 
 1276: apply_slave(M,F,A) ->
 1277:     request({apply,M,F,A}).
 1278: 
 1279: lambda_slave(Fun) ->
 1280:     request({lambda,Fun}).
 1281: 
 1282: exc_slave(Opts, Func, Args) ->
 1283:     try request({exc_top,Opts,Func,Args})
 1284:     catch
 1285:         Reason ->
 1286:             {crash,Reason}
 1287:     end.
 1288: 
 1289: request(Request) ->
 1290:     Tag = make_ref(),
 1291:     {Pid,Mref} = get(slave),
 1292:     Pid ! {self(),Tag,Request},
 1293:     result(Tag, Mref).
 1294: 
 1295: result(Tag, Mref) ->
 1296:     receive
 1297:         {Tag,Result} ->
 1298:             receive
 1299:                 Tag ->
 1300:                     Result
 1301:             end;
 1302:         {'DOWN',Mref,process,_Pid,Reason} ->
 1303:             throw(Reason)
 1304:     end.
 1305: 
 1306: 
 1307: 
 1308: %%% Some receive helpers %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 1309: %%%
 1310: 
 1311: receive_next() ->
 1312:     receive_next(?DEFAULT_RECEIVE_TIMEOUT).
 1313: 
 1314: receive_next(TO) ->
 1315:     receive
 1316:         M ->
 1317:             M
 1318:     after TO ->
 1319:               ct:fail(timeout)
 1320:     end.
 1321: 
 1322: receive_no_next(TO) ->
 1323:     receive M ->
 1324:                 ct:fail({unexpected_message,[M|flush(TO)]})
 1325:     after TO ->
 1326:               ok
 1327:     end.
 1328: 
 1329: flush(T) ->
 1330:     receive
 1331:         M ->
 1332:             [M|flush(T)]
 1333:     after T ->
 1334:               []
 1335:     end.
 1336: 
 1337: 
 1338: 
 1339: %%% Helpers %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 1340: %%%
 1341: 
 1342: %% Do not build garbage
 1343: %%
 1344: seq(M, N, R) when M =< N ->
 1345:     seq(M, N-1, [N|R]);
 1346: seq(_, _, R) -> R.
 1347: 
 1348: %% Do not call traced lists:reverse
 1349: reverse(L) ->
 1350:     reverse(L, []).
 1351: %%
 1352: reverse([], R) -> R;
 1353: reverse([H|T], R) ->
 1354:     reverse(T, [H|R]).
 1355: 
 1356: %% Abbreviate large complex terms to avoid croaking printout
 1357: %%
 1358: abbr(Term) ->
 1359:     abbr(Term, 20).
 1360: %%
 1361: abbr(Tuple, N) when is_tuple(Tuple) ->
 1362:     list_to_tuple(abbr_tuple(Tuple, N, 1));
 1363: abbr(List, N) when is_list(List) ->
 1364:     abbr_list(List, N, []);
 1365: abbr(Term, _) -> Term.
 1366: %%
 1367: abbr_tuple(Tuple, N, J) when J =< size(Tuple) ->
 1368:     if J > N; N =< 0 ->
 1369:            ['...'];
 1370:        true ->
 1371:            [abbr(element(J, Tuple), N-1)|abbr_tuple(Tuple, J+1, N)]
 1372:     end;
 1373: abbr_tuple(_, _, _) ->
 1374:     [].
 1375: %%
 1376: abbr_list(_, 0, R) ->
 1377:     case io_lib:printable_list(R) of
 1378:         true ->
 1379:             reverse(R, "...");
 1380:         false ->
 1381:             reverse(R, '...')
 1382:     end;
 1383: abbr_list([H|T], N, R) ->
 1384:     M = N-1,
 1385:     abbr_list(T, M, [abbr(H, M)|R]);
 1386: abbr_list(T, _, R) ->
 1387:     reverse(R, T).
